ing: 1/2 (15.25 ounce) can fruit cocktail, including syrup
des: "Almond gelatin - just like the way they serve it at Chinese dim sum!"
ins: Combine gelatin with boiling water, stirring until dissolved. Stir in sugar, milk, and almond extract. Pour into a 9 inch square pan and refrigerate overnight. Cut into cubes and serve with fruit cocktail.
